attributes.action: Clap for Captain Tom on the 30th April at 8pm for his 100th birthday
attributes.additional_details: He deserves it, and a great way to celebrate his 100th birthday
attributes.background: Arrange a uk wide clap for Captain Tom's amazing efforts of raising money for the NHS

rejection.details: We can only accept petitions about things the Government is responsible for. It is up to individuals to decide how to celebrate charitable actions by individuals such as Captain Sir Thomas Moore.
